4303620.name: Rise Under the Warstorm
4303620.description:
In Rise Under the Warstorm you gather resources, build workshops, and connect everything with conveyor belts. If your production breaks, your defense breaks too.

You don’t just build buildings — you design systems.
Plan your layouts, optimize resource flow, and turn raw materials into tools, structures, and military power. Every decision affects how fast you grow and how long you survive.

Enemies won’t wait.
Waves of enemies test your walls, towers, and army. You must decide where to expand, what to automate, and when to fight. Poor planning costs resources. Bad defense costs everything.

Explore new areas, unlock better technology, and move to the next map with stronger units and faster production lines. Your progress carries forward, but the challenges grow with you.
4303620.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 土耳其语

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
